title: Gluten free carrot cake pancakes
ingredients: ['Dry ingredients', '60g chopped walnuts', '225g gluten free flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon cream of tartar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', 'Wet ingredients', '400g cooked carrots', '350ml orange juice', '240ml water', '1 large egg, beaten', '2 tablespoons walnut oil', '1 tablespoon canola oil, or as needed']
